step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You're placing your hands correctly on your abdomen. Remember to inhale through your nose and tighten your muscles.
Great inhale and muscle tightening! Visualize the fluid moving to your chest as you breathe in.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Visualize pushing fluid out as you release the breath.
You're maintaining a comfortable posture. Ensure your hands are on your abdomen for this next breath.
Hands are well-placed. Remember to inhale through your nose and engage your whole body muscles.
Nice deep inhale and muscle tightening. Keep visualizing the lymph fluid moving towards your chest.
Well done relaxing and exhaling. Visualize pushing the fluid out as you complete the breath.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercises! Remember to inhale through your nose, tighten your muscles, and visualize fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale slowly through your mouth while relaxing, visualizing pushing fluid out. Keep up the good work!
